articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on 20th century
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Yasser Arafat
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Yasser Arafat 
    Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was sent to the  leader Kim Jong Il by Palestinian President Yasser Arafat on the New Year Juche 90 (2001).
 Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, handed it to Paek Nam Sun, Minister of Foreign Affairs, on Dec. 29.

articles.title: Floral baskets laid before statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral baskets laid before statue of Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Economic and commercial officials of different countries in Korea laid floral baskets before the statue of the great leader President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to him on December 29 on the New Year Juche 90 (2001).
 Written on the ribbons hanging from the floral baskets were letters reading "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Live Forever."

articles.title: Floral basket and congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral basket and congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A floral basket and a congratulatory message were sent to the leader Kim Jong Il by the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the New Year Juche 90 (2001).
 Palestinian ambassador e. p. Shaher Mohammed Abdlah who is the doyen of the diplomatic corps handed them to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun on December 29.    
 A congratulatory message was also presented to Kim Jong Il by the economic and commercial councillors' corps here on the occasion of the New Year.

articles.title: North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee hosts reception
Floral baskets sent to Cuban embassy
articles.content:
Floral baskets sent to Cuban embassy 
    Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Ministries and a national institution of the DPRK sent floral baskets to the Cuban embassy here on December 29 on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution.
 Floral baskets in the name of the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Foreign Trade and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries were separately handed to Cuban ambassador Jose Manuel Inclan Embade.

articles.title: Film show and reception
Unionists of S. Korean communications continue strike
Reception given by Cuban ambassador
articles.content:
Reception given by Cuban ambassador 
    Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Cuban ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Inclan Embade yesterday gave a reception at the embassy on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution.
 Present on invitation were Pak Song Chol, honorary vice-president of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yang Gon, department director of the central committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Minister of Education Pyon Yong Rip who is chairman of the Korea-Cuba solidarity committee and other officials concerned.    
 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Friendship medals awarded to Russian figures
articles.content:
Friendship medals awarded to Russian figures 
    Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Friendship medals of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea were awarded to members of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
 An awarding ceremony was held at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on December 21.    
 At the ceremony a decree of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding the friendship medals was read out and medals were awarded to chairman of the association Vladimir Tolstikov and its members.
